Headline: #4 Cottage Grove and #X4 Cottage Grove Express Temporary Reroute near Cottage Grove/36th Street
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove, X4 Cottage Grove Exp. buses rrted NB: Cottage Grove, 39th, King Dr, 35th, & Cottage Grove; SB: Michigan, 35th, King Dr, 39th, & Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove and #X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Cottage Grove/36th Street, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Cottage Grove, 39th, King Drive, 35th, and Cottage Grove.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, 35th, King Drive, 39th, and Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Kenmore
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Wilson, Sheridan, and Lawrence due to street blockage at Lawrence/Kenmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Wilson, Sheridan, and Lawrence due to street blockage at Lawrence/Kenmore.

Allow extra travel time.
